channel.title: G Suite Status Dashboard
channel.description: Updates on performance information for G Suite services from the G Suite Status Dashboard (http://www.google.com/appsstatus#hl=en). Unless otherwise noted, this status information applies to consumer services as well as services for organizations using G Suite.

item.title: Google Drive
item.description:
November 17, 2020 10:49:00 AM PST

The problem with Google Drive has been resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and continued support. Please rest assured that system reliability is a top priority at Google, and we are making continuous improvements to make our systems better.

 November 17, 2020 10:04:00 AM PST

Google Drive service has already been restored for some users, and we expect a resolution for all users within the next 1 hours. Please note this time frame is an estimate and may change.


Please refresh your tab. If issue persists please restart your browser.

 November 17, 2020 9:20:00 AM PST

We are continuing to investigate this issue. We will provide an update by November 17, 2020 10:20:00 AM PST detailing when we expect to resolve the problem.


When sharing with specific recipients in Drive (and related editors) recipients may receive more than one email notification.

 November 17, 2020 8:19:00 AM PST

We are continuing to investigate this issue. We will provide an update by November 17, 2020 9:19:00 AM PST detailing when we expect to resolve the problem.


When sharing with specific recipients in Drive (and related editors) recipients may receive more than one email notification.

 November 17, 2020 8:17:00 AM PST

We're investigating reports of an issue with Google Drive. We will provide more information shortly.
